statements: SELECT * FROM patents WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT inventor_name, patent_number FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT invention_description FROM patents WHERE inventor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE inventor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, patent_number, inventor_name FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT approval_status FROM patents;
SELECT invention_description FROM patents WHERE approval_status = 'approved' ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT id, patent_number, inventor_name FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT title, inventor FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, patent_number, filing_date FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE inventor IS NULL;
SELECT id, title, patent_description FROM patents WHERE title LIKE '%database%';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, inventor FROM patents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT inventor, patent_number, filing_date FROM patents WHERE inventor LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT patents.*, legal_documents.document_type FROM patents JOIN legal_documents ON patents.id = legal_documents.related_patent;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT title, inventor, filing_date FROM patents WHERE inventor = 'John Doe';
SELECT patent_id, title, description FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT inventor_id, name, email FROM inventors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT patent_id, license_type, grant_date FROM patent_rights WHERE grant_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC, title ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, inventor FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT description FROM patents WHERE LENGTH(description) > 500;
SELECT name, email FROM inventors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.title, i.name, pr.license_type FROM patents p JOIN inventors i ON p.inventor = i.name JOIN patent_rights pr ON p.patent_id = pr.patent_id ORDER BY p.title DESC, i.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT id, patent_number, inventor_name FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT invention_title, abstract FROM patents WHERE inventor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM patent_documents ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_history WHERE event_type = 'Filing' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT inventor_name FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patent_number, inventor_name, filing_date FROM patents WHERE inventor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT p.invention_title, i.expertise FROM patents p JOIN inventors i ON p.inventor_name = i.inventor_name;
SELECT pd.document_name, pd.document_type, p.invention_title FROM patent_documents pd JOIN patents p ON pd.patent_id = p.id ORDER BY pd.document_type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Intellectual_Property_Rights ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT id, inventor FROM Intellectual_Property_Rights WHERE inventor='John Doe';
SELECT owner_name, patent_number FROM Patent_Owners WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Nanotechnology_Innovations WHERE application_field IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, category_name FROM Patent_Categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Intellectual_Property_Rights WHERE filing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT inventor, patent_number FROM Intellectual_Property_Rights WHERE inventor LIKE 'John%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patents FROM Intellectual_Property_Rights;
SELECT p.owner_name, c.category_name FROM Patent_Owners p JOIN Patent_Categories c ON p.patent_number = c.id;
SELECT * FROM Nanotechnology_Innovations ORDER BY innovation_name DESC;
